name: Bounce rate
description: Bounce rate reflects a single page session. These sessions happen when a customer visits certain page and closes it without clicking on any link or doing any action. A too low or too high bounce rate on your website or a specific web page might indicate a measurement issue. A step-by-step guide for anomaly detection in Waaila can be found in the documentation.

constants.name: anomalyDetectionConfig
constants.description: Settings of the anomaly detection analysis

blocks.description: Analyze the evolution of bounce rate
blocks.failMessage: There was an anomaly in the ${valueColumnName}
